leaflet.personalStatement: I've been fighting for a fairer deal for Hove and Portslade.

politicalExperience.achievements: Securing £2.5m to refurbish the King Alfred leisure centre. Planning permission granted for a new school.

endorsements.endorsement: Celia has a vast experience politically and brings lots of energy.
